Package se.arkalix.dto.json

JSON Data Transfer Object Utilities

This package contains utilities complementary to those of the DTO package when dealing with JSON. That being said, most of the contents of this package should only rarely be useful for handling JSON data, as most of the details regarding JSON encoding and decoding are handled automatically by the DTO code generator.
See Also:
JSON Value Types, RFC 8259
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JsonReadable
    Represents a type that can be constructed from JSON input.
    JsonWritable
    Represents a type that can be written as JSON.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonReader
    A DtoReader for reading JSON data.
    JsonWriter
    A DtoWriter for writing JSON data.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    JsonName
    Allows overriding the name of a DTO interface field when encoding or decoding it to/from JSON.
